title: Chicken noodle salad in a jar
ingredients: ['3 carrots, peeled and julienned', '2 red peppers, julienned', '135g chow mein noodles', '435g cooked chicken, shredded', '170g sliced romaine lettuce', '6 (1L) jars with lids', 'Dressing', '65g creamy peanut butter', '3 tablespoons water', '2 tablespoons reduced salt soy sauce', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '2 1/2 teaspoons rice vinegar', '1 teaspoon ground coriander']
